content:
imprint

imprint groups information relating to the publication or distribution of a bibliographic item. [3.12.2.4 Imprint, Size of a Document, and Reprint Information ]
Modulecore â€” Elements common to all TEI documents
Attributes
  • att.global ( @xml:id , @n , @xml:lang , @xml:base , @xml:space ) (att.global.rendition ( @rend , @style , @rendition ) ) (att.global.linking ( @corresp , @synch , @sameAs , @copyOf , @next , @prev , @exclude , @select ) ) (att.global.analytic ( @ana ) ) (att.global.facs ( @facs ) ) (att.global.change ( @change ) ) (att.global.responsibility ( @cert , @resp ) ) (att.global.source ( @source ) )

    Content model<content> <sequence> <alternate minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <elementRef key="classCode"/> <elementRef key="catRef"/> </alternate> <sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <alternate> <!--just here to so odd2dtd puts parens into DTD--> <classRef key="model.imprintPart"/> <!--just here to so odd2dtd puts parens into DTD--> <classRef key="model.dateLike"/> </alternate> <elementRef key="respStmt" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <classRef key="model.global" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </sequence> </content>
